name: Dis' challenge
description:
Strange puzzle adventure game kinda inspired by Chip's Challenge, Blobbo (from Mac) and Deadly Rooms of Death.

Controlls:
-WASD/Arrows -- move
-R -- restart
-U/Backspace -- undo move
-E/Enter/Space -- read dialogue

This game features:
-15 different rooms full of puzzles (or something, I didn't count)
-Cool backgrounds that are definetly not distracting
-Very well written storyline and dialogues
-Pixel girls

Maybe you'll even enjoy this game, who knows ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
